author: Eric Nefflen
comment: This is what should have shipped as a standard option on smart watches.  One thing I'd ask the developer is to allow users to remove the zero leading the hours, it's not typically seen on US watches.  Well worth the price.
title: Nice and simple

author: C Collins
comment: I purchased this because of the gorgeous options, but then I found out that each of the options I thought were included have to be purchased separately. I can understand SOME in-app purchases, but this is ridiculous. I've purchased other apps for the same price they have way more free options available with the initial purchase. You need to be more open about what is included in the initial purchase: next to nothing. I won't be purchasing any other apps from this developer. Let the buyer beware.

reply.author: flick
reply.content: Hi there! Thank you for your feedback! The app only has one in app purchase, that gives you all the customization options.

author: Kareem Halabi
comment: The whole reason that I bought the app was to randomize the background as displayed in the screen shots. Very disappointed that it is not there
title: What happened to the randomize background feature?

author: Bryce Wilson
comment: Lovely watch face but some basic features/functions are missing. Option to remove leading zero, Rotating background, Battery percentage display, MM/DD/YR choice, and the ability to chose how long in full brightness. Weather would also be nice.
title: Awesome But Lacking...

author: David Callaway
comment: Was going with 5 stars but now it says it's  not compatible with my Nexus 6? Useless!

author: Christopher Jack
comment: Love it, only problem is when restoring phone or getting a new phone, prompts for purchase again. Update Sept 2017:New phone, still prompts for purchase! Tired of this....

author: allan figot
comment: Installed on lg v10 and it did not show up as an installed app

reply.author: flick
reply.content: You can configure the watchface on the Android Wear app itself. Just choose the watchface there and click on the cog.

title: Didn't show up

author: Adolfo Gallego
comment: Disappeared from my phone and my watch.. installed but unable to manage the background, tried uninstalling and reinstalling but same issue
title: What happened?

author: Martijn Havinga
comment: Finally, a watchface that lets me configure it to be a simple, minimalistic one! An option to set a single color as the background image would be nice though, had to upload a black image to my drive folder to fix that for now.

author: Amy Bettinger
comment: The initial bug of custom pictures not going to the watch has been fixed. As I had hoped, this watch face is lovely! Simple yet customizable.

author: Jeremy Schneider
comment: Easy to read minimalist low light with gorgeous backgrounds when on. Love all the current customization options plus ability to add personal backgrounds.  I feel like this is the watch face all that should have been included.  Would like to see additional options like removing the first 0.  That would be the best.  Additional options like adding battery life or am/pm would be a nice bonus!
title: Great!

author: Jennifer Craig
comment: Would not allow me to change the background even after I bought the app.
title: Not happy

author: Al Probert
comment: Paid for full (single price unlocks ALL features BTW). Great looking face, but, please add battery % at the very least. That along with randomised or slideshow (carousel) backgrounds would be a 5star app! Thanks Dev.

author: Dar
comment: Suits my moods perfectly changing pictures on the fly. This is one of the best watch faces that allows you to import directly any picture you wish so simple and very refined.
title: Fantastic !

author: Liam Shribman-Hollings
comment: Great simple app but would love to customize how long the custom photo stays active, it just fades to black which kind of ruins the point.

author: Gee Bee
comment: No its not fixed urbane 2, still has pass to watch bug.Will change to 5 star when or if it gets fixed.
title: Damn

author: trish mccormack
comment: Love adding a custom wallpaper, and other customisations . Hoping updates may include a different style of clock, and/or saving faces x
title: Great

author: Sapphire Gaston
comment: After paying for the full version I can't get the picture from my gallery to upload on the watch face.
title: The customization is still not working.

author: Tara Pennington
comment: Doesn't work on Pixel XL...

author: Clifton W
comment: Everything is an extra cost
title: Pay for everything

author: Ray Stuckey
comment: Doesn't have a way to change the background or anything. No phone app, no on-watch settings.

reply.author: flick
reply.content:
Hi there Ray,
As of one of the last Android Wear updates, the watchface configuration can be accessed directly from the Android Wear App. When applying the watchface from within the app, click on the gear icon that overlays the watchface.
Thanks!

author: sabah ali
comment: I can't change the background on the watchface or do anything. I have a Sony smartwatch 3
title: Can't change watchface

author: Tammi McCalister
comment: It would be Great if you can give the option to set time in Military time as well.
title: Good App

author: jonas luo
comment: Can't find it anywhere, neither as an app or a watchface in Android Wear app.

reply.author: flick
reply.content:
Hi there!
If you look on the Android Wear app, when you choose the Watchface you have a little cog over it. Click on it and there you can configure the settings.
Thanks!

author: TRIDIB SOOD
comment: I dont see the app on my phone. Pl help me with it.

author: Mage Us
comment: Just not connecting to my moto via s6 edge.
title: Like it...

author: Tom Gill
comment: Option to move icons for charge,  do not disturb etc.  Would be be great :) *
title: Incona

comment: Very good app could be more user friendly,  but overall very good

author: Evan Raibstein
comment: Would love being able to place the time at the bottom.
title: Almost perfect

author: Jeremiah Tan
comment: Simple and nice. Love the background. Simply mesmerising!
title: Mesmerising background!

author: Nathan McLennan
comment: My favorite watchface. Clean, simple with good options.

author: Chris Woodhouse
comment: As above
title: Best simple non analogue face

author: Simon Caseault
comment: Great design and customization exactly what I needed

author: Edgar Santos Fernández
comment: Works smoothly this version

author: Cody Smiley
comment: I really like this app, but after purchasing the pro version I am unable to set custom backgrounds. Everything else is great, but if I'm going to give you money it had better work properly.
title: Beautiful

author: Zeyna Sali
comment: Hey guys! I really like your watch face. It's one of my favorite. Anyhow, I would like to ask whether the premium fee is one time only. Or is it a monthly subscription? Will I have all the features unlocked or specific only? Thanks!!

reply.author: flick
reply.content:
Hi there!
It's a one time only thing, unlocking all the features.
Thanks!

title: I want to buy premium features but

author: Sean Wood
comment: A randomizer for the background  would be great. Plus the ability to added more than one other personal selection. Also the ability to alter the text color would be nice.
title: Nice...

author: Eddie Quezada
comment: Exactly what I was looking for in a watch face! Only suggestions would be offer blank colors, and date formating such as making it say month first instead of day. Purchased the full version, loving it!
title: Great!

author: Tim Blair
comment: It looks great, just takes a few re-install after paying in order to use the other watch faces.
title: On the second re-install, it started to work.

author: Arik Licholat
comment: The pro version can be made to look very beautiful. Wish there were more font options.
title: Nice
